metadata.title: CVE-2023-3610 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - high
metadata.description:
A use-after-free vulnerability in the Linux kernel's netfilter: nf_tablescomponent can be exploited to achieve local privilege escalation. Flaw inthe error handling of bound chains causes a use-after-free in the abortpath of NFT_MSG_NEWRULE. The vulnerability requires CAP_NET_ADMIN to betriggered. We recommend upgrading past commit4bedf9eee016286c835e3d8fa981ddece5338795.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-3610` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-2.2
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-2.2
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic-64k - 6.5.0-2.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1008-aws - 6.5.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-azure - 6.5.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-gcp - 6.5.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1009-ibm - 6.5.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency - 6.5.0-2.2.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency-64k - 6.5.0-2.2.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1010-oracle - 6.5.0-1003.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-2.2').

linux-azure package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1002.2').

linux-gke package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
linux-ibm package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1003.3').
linux-lowlatency package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-2.2.1').
linux-oracle package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1003.3').
linux-raspi package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
linux-oem-6.8 package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
